summary.p: A complete text (mūlam) of the Naiṭatam, with an unpublished commentary from preface to end.
Description by E. Wilden based on the digital images available on Gallica.
Dimensions assessed by E. Francis at the time of examination (October 2022).

supportDesc.foliation: Foliation in Tamil and European numbers (U3).

collation.desc: 1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
337 folios = Naiṭatam: Text & Commentary. Parallel Tamil foliation 1-337 and Arabic foliation 1-337. Verso blank.

additions.desc:
On a detached sheet of paper (185 x 150 mm; not covered by photos on Gallica):
Mr Duclerque. N° 3
intitulé Naguijedame ou histoire
de Nallamagârâja, renommée dans
la chasteté & dans la bauté
Ce livre contient tant en
vers qu’en prose.
(par Adivirarameine ,) contenant 340
Feuilles.
The number is that found in the catalogue of Velanguani Arokium (1845).
BnF current shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 250 (front cover, recto).

binding.p: Ebony woodcovers, made at the instance of Ducler.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year kara of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1831-1832, 1771-1772, 1711-1712, etc. See colophon (U3, f337r6). Dated to circa 1770 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) and to 1770 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds. By Ducler's scribe, working around 1830.

provenance.p: Copied for Philippe Ducler by an unnamed copyist in Karaikal Jail. See Burnouf (1832).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Philippe Ducler. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. 86.

listBibl.bibl: Naiṭatam. 1962. Naiṭatam mūlamum uraiyum. Comm. by Kaḻakap Pulavar Kuḻuviṉar. Tirunelvēli/Ceṉṉai: Tirunelvēlit Teṉṉintiya Caivacittānta Nūṟpatippuk Kaḻakam (Kaḻakaveḷiyīṭu 1099).

Burnouf, Eugène. 1832. Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique. Journal asiatique 10: 84-91. — See p. 90, no. 30.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris : E. Leroux. — See p. 39, no. 250
Velanguani Arokium [Vēḷāṅkaṇṇi Ārōkkiyam]. 1845. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls de la Bibliothèque royale. BnF NAF 5443. — See p. 9, no. 3.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f58r, no. 234 250.
